Complete QR Ordering Features

Everything Albanian restaurants need to modernize operations, serve more customers, and reduce staff workload

Instant QR Ordering

Customers scan table QR codes and immediately access your full menu. No downloads, no registration - just scan and order.

  • Works on any smartphone without apps
  • Table context preserved throughout ordering
  • Offline functionality for uninterrupted service

Table A1

Beach Bar Durrës

Birra Korça €3.50
Qofte Shqiptare €8.00

Orders Dashboard

SKN-20240916-001
Table A1 • 2 items • €11.50
SKN-20240916-002
Table B3 • 1 item • €6.50
SKN-20240916-003
Table C2 • 3 items • €15.00

Real-Time Order Management

Manage all orders from one centralized dashboard. Update status with one click and keep customers informed automatically.

  • Instant order notifications with sound alerts
  • Filter by status: New, Preparing, Ready, Served
  • Order history and analytics

Built for Albanian Restaurants

Every feature designed with Albanian restaurant operations and customer preferences in mind

Albanian & English Menus

Complete bilingual support with Albanian names, descriptions, and currency formatting for both locals and tourists.

Staff Role Management

Different access levels for staff, managers, and owners. Control who can see analytics, manage menus, and access billing.

QR Code Management

Generate unlimited QR codes for tables. Download in multiple sizes for printing or display screens.

Business Analytics

Track popular items, peak hours, table turnover rates, and revenue trends to optimize your operations.

Easy Menu Updates

Update prices, descriptions, and availability instantly. Changes appear immediately on all QR code menus.

Albanian Support

24/7 customer support in Albanian language. Setup assistance, training, and ongoing technical support included.

Seamless Integration

Works with your existing setup and popular restaurant tools

Works With Your Current Setup

No need to replace your existing POS system or change your workflow. SKAN.AL integrates seamlessly with most restaurant operations.

  • Compatible with existing WiFi networks
  • No hardware installation required
  • Works on tablets, smartphones, and computers
  • Export order data to Excel/CSV

Easy Setup Process

1
Upload your menu items
2
Generate QR codes for tables
3
Print and place QR codes
✓
Start receiving orders!
